QuestData.Title: The Warden's Cage
QuestData.Description: The fragments you obtained are only half of the medallion. The Ashtongue leader, Akama, must have kept the other half.$B$BI dread to ask this of you, as Akama is both evil and cunning.$B$BHe and the Ashtongue Deathsworn - the vilest and most brutal of the tribe - are rumored to run a torture chamber inside the Warden's Cage.$B$BI want you to find that dreaded prison, and find the whereabouts of Akama. His second in command at the location is a Broken known as Sanoru - interrogate him if you have to.
QuestData.LogDescription: Anchorite Ceyla wants you to enter the Warden's Cage, south of the Ruins of Baa'ri and interrogate Sanoru on Akama's whereabouts.$B$BCompleting quests for the Aldor will cause your Scryers reputation to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: We've been expecting you, $N. Akama said you would arrive sooner or later.
